SELECT a.art_code_seq, a.writer_code_seq, r.writer_name, r.writer_brand_name, r.writer_send_price, a.art_photo, a.art_category, a.art_name, a.art_price, a.art_discount, a.art_viewcount, a.art_keyword, a.art_register_date
FROM art_tb a,wishlist_tb w, writer_tb r
WHERE a.writer_code_seq = r.writer_code_seq AND a.art_code_seq = w.wishlist_option_code AND w.wishlist_option = '좋아하는작품' AND w.member_code_seq = #{memberCode}
ORDER BY w.wishlist_time DESC
